archimate:Deliverable.name: Design for FPS service integration and deployment
archimate:Deliverable.documentation:
Design for the function, and processes within, which is used to onboard services to the Foundation Platform Service. This process is currently known as TMA OnBoarding process and is fully ran as manual process without proper security validations. Project will deliver detailed design how integration and deployment works in the new system.
All designs will adhere/address following:
- Required People and the processes - Security policies and best practises - Information and data in the system - Dependencies to other services - Connect Sovereign in-country operations requirements - Standard IT Service Management - Capacity management - Availability, resilience and disaster recovery - Risk management - End user & operator trainings
